name: nhl_picks
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool nhl_api.
Tool description: This API provides instant access to the latest data for all operations and players in the NHL. It features scores, odds, bookmakers' stats, standings, and historical data.
API description: With this endpoint you can get the NHL PickCenter data for a specified game

is_id.description: The ID of the NHL game for which PickCenter data is requested.
